text: The Rise of the Johnsons is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * John Edwards - Mr. Johnson * Mattie Edwards - Mrs. Johnson * Oliver Hardy - The Grocery Man ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:1914 short films Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: The Rise of the Johnsons
